text: Suleyman Karaman (born 1956 in Refahiye, Erzincan) is a Turkish politician, who was a former General Manager and Chairman of the Board of Directors of Turkish State Railways (TCDD) and Deputy General Manager of Istanbul transportation authority (IETT)."Mr Ömer Yildiz succeeds Mr Süleyman Karaman as the Director General and President of the Board of TCDD", 17 March 2015 ==Footnotes== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Erzincan Category:Istanbul Technical University alumni
title: Suleyman Karaman
